column5: With high north winds today the remaining ice in Goose Bay is nowhere to be seen. My record book will show April 15th as the ice out day for 2012. This is the earliest date since I have been keeping records. Best wishes to all for a safe and productive fishing season....
Thanks for the update Rob! What are the water levels looking like? In less than 9 weeks we will be hitting Lac Seul again to battle the walleyes and pike!

The water is low, but I think about normal for this time of year. We just need some rain to fill the lake up before the season opens. The one good thing about low water is that there is less water for the fish to hide in and when you find them they tend to be more concentrated
Thanks Rob.We will see you in June.
